tests.prompt: Create a DungeonData with 2 rooms, 1 connection, 3 entities (monster, obstacle, door), and 2 walls. Serialize to JSON and deserialize. Verify all data round-trips correctly.
Verify that position types use CubeCoordinate (x, y, z) format where x+y+z=0, not offset coordinates.
Verify EntityData can represent all three types: monster (with MonsterType), obstacle (with ObstacleType), door (with DoorType and Properties map).
Create a door entity with Properties containing 'open': false, 'locked': true, 'trap_dc': 15. Verify these serialize and deserialize correctly.
